Some random text here, maybe a quote of some sort for something. The purpose of this text here it to create space between the above content and the content below. This is simply for aesthetics nothing more so nothing of it, just me trying to be neat as possible. Hope this makes sense cause if not I don't know what I'm gonna put here.

hi, there!

I'm Tebogo Sophie Mphela

So here we will give a short intro of who or what you are as a whole, I kinda decided this will be split into two paragraphs where the first one explains who is Tebogo, like a short history into why you yarn where you learnt it. It doesn't necessarily have to be specific content it can a fun story explaining that you don't crochet for money in a sense it tricks people into thinking you're this Goddess who just loves yarning which is true but kinda gives them a false sense of thinking you don't do it for the money. I mean we all know money makes the world go round but you gotta be smart how you trick people into giving you money. You give em services sure but for the money. I'm just joking I'm random text so yeah.

This is the second paragraph where we will give a short history of what Souphie's Studio stems from, what makes it Souphie's Studio. A short summary not the entire story. The rest of the story will go on the about page, which will group the about me, my services(which is the services we provide and how se provide them) and the faq page as well. FAQ page is frequently asked questions. Like general faq, where people ask random questions about how trust worthy you are, return policies and such things. Finally we will have project faq, I feel this is the most important one. Here you will explain how people should operate with you before a project, like the buying yarn thing, 50% deposit things.

Create beauty with me.
